pages.title: Stack
pages.text: Multiblock (top->bottom): blast_funnel, blast_funnel, blast_funnel, thermal_furnace. Place any firebox below the furnace—electric, standard, or oil—and remember it runs only on heat, no motor required.

pages.title: IO
pages.text: Feed items from the firebox/input side; outputs leave the opposite face. Keep conveyors or pipes on the output to avoid stalls. Ideal for high-heat smelting before alloying steps.

pages.name: Thermal Furnace Stack
pages.text: Top-down: blast funnels x3, thermal furnace at zero, firebox under. Visualize to align the column. Any firebox type works; the blueprint shows the electric variant.
